languageToPublish: Please select in which language(s) you wish to submit this record:
title: Title / Name of the area
featureConditions: Feature conditions and future outlook of the area
jurisdiction: Is this marine areas beyond national jurisdiction?
areasApprovedForInclusionInTheEbsa: a) Areas meeting EBSA criteria approved for inclusion in the EBSA Repository
approvedByAPartyOrGovernment: Approved by a Party or other Government through national process (national jurisdiction only)
areasThroughNationalProcess: b) Areas meeting EBSA criteria for consideration by COP or by a Party /other Government through national process
recommendedBySBSTTA: Recommended by SBSTTA to COP for consideration and possible inclusion in the EBSA Repository
OngoingOfficialNationalProcess: Ongoing official national process (within national jurisdiction only)
areasForConsiderationBySBSTTA: c) Areas meeting EBSA criteria for consideration by SBSTTA
preparedByCompetentOrganizations: Prepared by Competent Organizations through regional processes
areasForConsiderationByWorkshop: d) Areas meeting EBSA criteria for consideration by CBD regional Workshop
otherRelevantDocument: Other relevant website address or attached documents
otherRelevantAreas: e) Other relevant Areas meeting EBSA criteria
assessmentOfArea: Assessment of the area against CBD EBSA criteria
notesInfos: The field “Notes” is for personal reference and can be seen only when the record is being edited.
otherRelevantInformationInfo: Please use this field to provide any other relevant information that may not have been addressed elsewhere in the record.
c2: C2: Special importance for life-history stages of species
c3: C3: Importance for threatened, endangered or declining species and/or habitats
c4: C4: Vulnerability, fragility, sensitivity, or slow recovery
